text:
- Our goal is to bring world
class therapies and cures
to the world's most challenging diseases,
life threatening diseases,

and getting the patient
access to those therapies.
The whole pharma industry

is going through a digitization
and transformation.
Companies are being challenged

to bring drugs to market
faster, with higher efficacy.
Data science and advanced analytics
is a big component of enabling that.
We're going through

an accelerated data center
migration initiative.
Over the past year, we've moved about 50%
of our data center workloads into AWS.

And this is includes
mission-critical workloads
that really run our business.

And that again is giving
us a lot more agility,
scalability, security, disaster recovery
than we have had in the past.

Our efforts here are really
democratizing data and analytics
across the entirety of that value chain,
putting it onto a single, scalable,
secure platform, enabling self-service,

because that's where
the innovation happens.

We don't wanna be in the
business of running data centers.
We want trusted, scalable,

self-service democratized
data and analytics assets
where we can focus on what we do best,
researching and commercializing

and developing best-in-class
therapies and cures
for challenging diseases.
